channel.title: 2025 on Eric's Nerons
channel.description: Recent content in 2025 on Eric's Nerons

item.title: And We're Back!
item.description:
And We’re back!

And we are back from that… interesting break. Rumors of me giving up blogging are greatly exaggerated, and I’m back! Previously mentioned weight loss doctor visit went well, I’m much lighter now. I’ve gone almost exclusively Linux at this point, and feel like I’m much more creative these days than I used to be. At least I try.

Looking Forward to 2026

Some projects I want to try in 2026:
